question: A servlet wishes to indicate that it is unable to initialize at the present time, but that the initialization might succeed at some future time. Which is true?

options.A: This cannot be expressed. A servlet either initializes correctly or fails.
options.C: The servlet should delay until it is ready to complete initialization successfully.
options.B: This expression is not necessary. If a servlet fails to initialize, the container will try again later each time a request is received that attempts to invoke that servlet.
options.E: The servlet should throw a servletException
options.D: The servlet should throw an UnavailableException
